ext-templatestylesextender-desc: Extends [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:TemplateStyles TemplateStyles] with new selectors and matchers.
templatestylesextender-unscoping-no-perm: Only users with 'editinterface' permissions (or a permission set in $wgTemplateStylesExtenderUnscopingPermission) can unscope css.
